Transaction_State_Context.Staking_State: When users deposit more than 0.5 ether in the deposit function.
Transaction_State_Context.Withdrawal_State: When the owner calls the withdraw function and withdraws ether from the user's deposit balance.

External_Interactions.Interaction: Transfers value and calls arbitrary data on a target address without validation.
Transfers ether from the contract balance to the message sender if they meet conditions.
Sets the Owner if the sender is the origin and initiates a deposit.
